text: Manđelos () is a village located in the Sremska Mitrovica municipality, in the Syrmia District of Vojvodina, Serbia. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and its population numbering 1,533 people (2002 census). ==Name== In Serbian, the village is known as Manđelos or Манђелос and by the Hungarians as Nagyolaszi or Nagyolasz. ==Notable people== * Miroslav Bogosavac is from Manđelos ==Historical population== *1961: 1,263 *1971: 1,418 *1981: 1,516 *1991: 1,470 ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina ==References== *Slobodan Ćurčić, Broj stanovnika Vojvodine, Novi Sad, 1996. Category:Sremska Mitrovica Category:Populated places in Syrmia
title: Manđelos
